page.title: 11The Podi Plod
page.content: This route for{joggers}is near where I live. Every day people from the Air Base jog around this{three mile course.It starts at the Base,then goes down the road to Podimore.Then you turn right and follow the road to Stockwitch Cross,then right again and you're back at the Base. Every morning before I go to school I see about ten people jogging around it at irregular intervals and more people jog around it during the day. My house is about halfway round so usually the joggers are still brisk when they get to Podimore.Some fat people are puffing though,especially on hot days.One man who was jogging was wearing Union Jack shorts and he looked ridiculous.In the summer most men don't wear shirts,only shorts for jogging.Sometimes they stop for a drink at the Podimore Inn. ANNA HILL.
